label: TransportSettingTemperature
comment: Temperature settings for a transport movement, such as a required storage temperature range.

objectProperties.comment: Informational instructions for achieving, maintaining, using or responding to this transport setting temperature.
The measure of the highest value of this transport setting temperature, such as a maximum temperature value of fourteen degrees Celsius.
The measure of the lowest value of this transport setting temperature, such as a minimum temperature value of four degrees Celsius.
The code specifying the type of transport setting temperature [Reference United Nations Code List (UNCL) 6245].
The measure of the value of this transport setting temperature, such as a temperature value of ten degrees Celsius.

referencedBy.comment: A transport related temperature setting applicable to these handling instructions.
The transport temperature setting for this supply chain consignment item.
